title: Coronation Street spoilers: Character dies in huge lorry crash?
text:
Robert Preston (Tristan Gemmill) is about to be left for dead in a catastrophic crash when his car collides with a lorry in a dramatic Coronation Street stunt. And if the impact of the collision doesn’t kill him, Michelle Connor (Kym Marsh) and Vicky Jefferies (Kerri Quinn) might as the hospital dash could lead to them both discovering the truth about his double life.

Robert is currently playing with fire by being engaged to both Michelle and Vicky. With Vicky carrying his baby, Robert is leading two separate lives but has experienced a number of near misses of late. But the crash could be what unfolds everything as both fiancees rush to his bedside as he fights for life.

Will the pieces fit together for Michelle and Vicky – and if Robert does wake up, will he wish he hadn’t as he faces the wrath of the women he has wronged?

A source told The Sun: ‘Robert’s speeding in Michelle’s car when he crashes into a lorry. Both his fiancées Michelle and Vicky will be terrified when they hear of what’s happened and head to the hospital to be with him.

‘If they come face to face Robert’s lies could be exposed and his whole life will fall apart. They’ll want to kill him – but he’ll have to survive catastrophic injuries first.’

The scenes are expected to play out later this year and it has already been confirmed that both Tristan and Kym are leaving their respective roles as Robert and Michelle. But any chance they had of heading off into the sunset together seems to be as destroyed as Robert’s car will be.

Robert’s story isn’t the only death drama heading to Corrie either – Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) will soon lose her life after her terminal illness snatches her away from her husband Daniel Osbourne (Rob Mallard) and their baby son Bertie.

It seems like there are some grim months ahead in Weatherfield.
